law.text: If the legislative body of the governmental unit finds that the bonds authorized will be insufficient to accomplish the purpose desired, additional bonds may be authorized and issued in the same manner.
law.history: Amended 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 179, sec. 49, effective March 25, 1960. -- Created 1945 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 3, sec. 11.
